DOC.brief_summary: This Phase IV , randomize , parallel-group study design evaluate cataractogenic potential quetiapine fumarate ( SEROQUEL ) compare putative non-cataractogenic antipsychotic medication risperidone ( RISPERDAL ) . This study conduct fulfill SEROQUEL Phase IV commitment regard evaluation cataractogenic potential .
